entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Taloyoak
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:26 PM MST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -35.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Taloyoak Airport 01:00 AM MST Wednesday 15 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -35.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.6 kPa falling
Visibility: 8.1 km
Humidity: 69 %
Wind Chill: -40
Dewpoint: -39.5°C
Wind: WNW 3 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 38.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h early this evening. Temperature steady near minus 38. Wind chill near minus 53. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. Temperature falling to minus 43 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 43 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 54. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Temperature rising to minus 35 by morning.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h after midnight. Temperature rising to minus 35 by morning. Wind chill minus 55 in the evening and minus 49 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Tuesday 14 February 2023
